7.verification_summary: Using the relation f(x) = gamma times derivative of log P(x), for a normal P centered at mu with variance sigma squared, P prime over P equals negative (x minus mu) divided by sigma squared, yielding F equals negative gamma times (x minus mu) divided by sigma squared, i.e. a linear restoring force with spring constant gamma over sigma squared.
